about_me.title: About Me
about_me.text: My name is João Batista, I'm from Santarém and I was born in July 1994. I started studying Computer Science at Dr. Ginestal Machado School, where I attended the Computer Systems Programming course. After that, I graduated in Computer Science at the School of Management and Technology of Santarém, at the age of 21.

grades.title: Academic Background / Grades
grades.intro1: From 2009 to 2012, I developed my knowledge in the programming field through the Computer Systems Programming course at Dr. Ginestal Machado School, with an average grade of 17.
grades.intro2: From 2012 to 2015, at the School of Management and Technology of Santarém, I completed my degree in Computer Science with an average grade of 15.
grades.intro3: Below are some relevant subjects from this degree, along with the grades.

experience_section.title: Technologies I Master
experience_section.linkedin_prompt: For detailed information about my professional experience and projects, add me on {{linkedinLink}} and request my CV.

footer.built_with: This portfolio was built with React & Vite.
